alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 515 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brownsville, or 4 miles southeast of Lead, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Brownsville, Tilford, Galena, Apple Springs and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 29 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
